name: AngularDataGrid
description: Light, flexible and performant Data Grid for AngularJS apps, with built-in sorting, pagination and filtering options, unified API for client-side and server-side data fetching,  seamless synchronization with browser address bar and total freedom in mark-up and styling suitable for your application. Angular 1.6 compliant. Materialize. Angular Design
author: Vitantonio Castronuovo <vitantonio@gmail.com> (https://github.com/vitantonioc/AngularDataGrid)
